definitions: The short, fine, soft hair of certain animals.
The skin of an animal with fur on it.
Animal skin with fur on it, or fabric resembling this, used in making or trimming garments.
A coat, cape, or similar garment made of fur.
Any of several heraldic tinctures representing animal skins in stylized form (e.g. ermine, vair).
A coating formed by hard water on the inside surface of a pipe, kettle, or other container.
A coating formed on the tongue, typically as a symptom of sickness.
